item.title: Fennel
item.description: Fennel # Overview # id fennel species Foeniculum vulgare Mill. family Apiaceae/Umbelliferae plant part used fruit; leaf region of origin Mediterranean; W. Asia; India macroarea Med.; W. Asia cultivation Argentina, Bulgaria, Germany, Greece, India, Lebanon color light green to light brown link POWO Names # English Arabic Chinese Hungarian nan nan 茴香 huíxiāng [hui-spice] édeskömény [sweet-cumin]
